contentrichtext.text: [[File:Krol Ko (5984979200).jpg|thumb|Krol Ko.]] '''Krol Ko''' ({{lang-km|ប្រាសាទក្រោលគោ}}) at [[Angkor]], [[Cambodia]], is a [[Buddhism|Buddhist]] temple built at the end of the 12th century under the rule of [[Jayavarman VII]]. It is north of [[Neak Pean]]. {{Commonscat|Krol Ko}} {{Angkorian sites}} {{coord|13|28|5|N|103|53|42|E|source:nowiki_region:KH_type:landmark|display=title}} [[Category:Buddhist temples in Cambodia]] [[Category:Siem Reap Province]] {{Cambodia-struct-stub}} {{Buddhism-monastery-stub}}
